name: COLOURlovers
description: A REST API for accessing over 10 million colors, 4.9 million palettes, and 6 million patterns for creative design projects

about.overview: COLOURlovers API provides developers with access to a vast community-driven database of colors, palettes, and patterns, enabling integration into design tools, applications, and creative projects, with support for JSON and XML formats.
features: Search over 10 million colors by hex, keywords, or hue
Retrieve 6 million patterns with associated colors
Support for JSON and XML response formats
useCases: Integrating color palettes into design applications
Building theme editors for websites or apps
Enhancing creative workflows with pattern data

endpoints.description: Search for multiple colors by keywords, hue, or sorting options
Retrieve color palettes with filters like keywords or creator

quickStart: Make a GET request to https://www.colourlovers.com/api/colors to search colors
Use parameters like 'keywords' or 'format=json' to customize responses

authentication.description: No authentication required for most endpoints; simply make GET requests to access data.
